Title: Welcome to Our Path-Finding Project!
歡迎來到Path-Finding專案!
Dialog: Please follow this tutorial to figure out the features of this application.
Body: Be free to click the button below in order to switch the preferred language.
點擊以下按鈕切換語言。

Title: Introduction to the application!
專案核心!
Dialog: Visualize a couple of maze algorithms and pathfinding algorithms and shortest path as well as bomb and weight node.
視覺化數種"迷宮演算法"及"搜尋演算法"的找尋方式，並找到最短路徑，包含必經過的點(Bomb)及權重(Weighted)。

Title: How to manipulate? - Pick an algorithm
如何使用? - 選擇一個演算法
Body: Some algorithms are weighted, while the others are unwighted. By the way, not all algorithms guarantee shortest path.Introduction of algorithms locate at the top of grids.
演算法分為weighted與unweighted，且不是所有演算法都保證最短路徑。演算法的介紹在網格上方。

Title: How to manipulate? - Create Maze
如何使用? - 建立迷宮
Dialog: Click a maze algorithm to automatically create walls or weights maze.
點擊maze演算法建立牆壁或是權重迷宮。

Title: How to manipulate? - Add Walls or Weights
如何使用? - 建立牆壁或權重
Dialog: Click on grids to add walls. Click on grids to while pressing W to add weights. Click again to cancel.
點擊方格加入牆壁，按住w點擊方格加入權重，再次點擊取消牆壁或權重。

Title: How to manipulate? - Add Bomb
如何使用? - 建立Bomb
Dialog: After picking an algorithm, click "Add Bomb" to add bomb
選擇完演算法後，點擊按鈕加入Bomb。
Body: Bomb：the algorithm will first look for the bomb and then look for target.
Bomb：演算法必須先找尋bomb才會找尋目標。

Title: How to manipulate? - Visualize & Drag Nodes
如何使用? - 開始視覺化 & 拖拉結果
Dialog: Processing after press visualize button. You can drag nodes even after an algorithm has finished running.
按下Visualize後，開始執行，執行完後實時更新找尋結果。

Title: How to manipulate? - Other Functional Buttons
如何使用? - 其他功能
Dialog: You can visualize, clear the entire board, clear walls and weights, clear the current path and adjust the visualization speed, all from the navbar.
你可以開始，重置網格，重置牆壁跟權重，重置找尋路徑，更改速度。

Title: Enjoy! - Hope you enjoy the application.
Enjoy! - 希望您喜歡這個專案
Dialog: If you find any questions or bugs, pls contact to me by email.
如有任何疑問或是發現bugs，請用Email與我聯繫。
